metadata.title: CVE-2023-3772 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s IP framework for transformingpackets (XFRM subsystem). This issue may allow a malicious user withCAP_NET_ADMIN privileges to directly dereference a NULL pointer inxfrm_update_ae_params(), leading to a possible kernel crash and denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1094.101').
